src: “Saat ini ada mencit umur 4 bulan nondiabetes yang dulunya diabetes,” tambahnya.
mt: “There is a nondiabetic 4-month-old mouse that was previously diabetic,” he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor kedokteran di Dalhousie University di Halifax, Nova Scotia dan ketua divisi klinis dan ilmiah di Perhimpunan Diabetes Kanada memperingatkan bahwa penelitiannya masih berada di tahap awal.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association warns that his research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Seperti halnya ahli-ahli lain, dia merasa skeptis apakah diabetes dapat disembuhkan, menegaskan bahwa penemuan-penemuan ini tidak relevan dengan orang-orang yang telah mengidap diabetes Jenis 1.
mt: Like other experts, he was skeptical that diabetes could be cured, emphasizing that these findings were not relevant to people who had Type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Sara Danius, sekretaris permanen Komite Nobel Literatur di Akademi Swedia, pada hari Senin mengumumkan kepada publik selama berlangsungnya program radio di Sveriges Radio di Swedia bahwa komite tersebut tidak bisa menghubungi Bob Dylan secara langsung untuk menyampaikan kemenangannya atas Hadiah Nobel 2016 di bidang Literatur. Sara akhirnya menyerah menghubunginya.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy, announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the committee had been unable to contact Bob Dylan directly to inform him of his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature. She eventually gave up trying to reach him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: "Danius berkata, "Saat ini kita tidak melakukan apa-apa. Saya sudah menelepon dan mengirimkan surel kepada kolaborator terdekatnya dan memperoleh balasan yang sangat bersahabat. Untuk saat ini hal tersebut sudah cukup."
mt: "Danius said, "Right now we're doing nothing. I've called and emailed my closest collaborators and received very friendly replies. For now that's enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Sebelumnya, CEO Ring, Jamie Siminoff, berkomentar bahwa perusahaan tersebut bermula saat bel rumahnya tidak terdengar dari tokonya yang berada di garasi.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff commented that the company began when his home alarm didn't work from his store in the garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Ia melakukan pembuatan bel pintu dengan teknologi WiFi, katanya.
mt: He made a doorbell with WiFi technology, he said.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff mengatakan penjualan meningkat setelah ia muncul di episode Shark Tank 2013, ketika panel acara tersebut menolak membiayai perusahaan rintisan.
mt: Siminoff said sales increased after he appeared on the 2013 episode of Shark Tank, when the show's panel rejected funding the startup.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Di akhir tahun 2017, Siminoff muncul di saluran televisi belanja QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring juga menyelesaikan sebuah tuntutan hukum terhadap perusahaan keamanan saingan, ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring also settled a lawsuit against a rival security company, ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Walau ada satu vaksin eksperimental yang tampaknya mampu mengurangi kematian akibat Ebola, sampai saat ini belum ada obat yang jelas-jelas terbukti cocok untuk mengobati infeksi yang ada.
mt: While there is one experimental vaccine that appears to reduce Ebola mortality, there is no clear-cut treatment for the infection yet.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: ZMapp yang menjadi salah satu koktail antibodi awalnya di lapangan memunculkan harapan, tetapi beberapa studi formal mengindikasikan bahwa manfaatnya dalam mencegah kematian lebih sedikit dibanding yang diharapkan.
mt: ZMapp, one of the early antibody cocktails, initially raised hopes, but several formal studies indicated that its benefit in preventing death was less than expected.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Dalam uji coba PALM, ZMapp berfungsi sebagai kontrol, yang berarti para ilmuwan menggunakannya sebagai dasar dan membandingkan tiga perlakuan lain dengannya.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as the control, meaning researchers used it as the baseline and compared three other treatments to it.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Gymnastics mendukung surat dari Komite Olimpiade Amerika Serikat dan menerima kebutuhan mutlak keluarga Olimpiade dalam mempromosikan lingkungan yang aman bagi seluruh atlet kita.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes the urgent need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Kami setuju dengan pernyataan USOC, bahwa demi kepentingan para atlet dan klub kami, serta olahraga mereka, lebih baik untuk ke depannya melakukan perubahan berarti di dalam organisasi kami, ketimbang melakukan pembatalan sertifikasi.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that for the benefit of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, it is better to make significant changes within our organization, rather than to revoke certification.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics mendukung penyelidikan independen yang mungkin mengungkap bagaimana penyalahgunaan proporsi yang dijelaskan dengan begitu berani oleh para penyintas Larry Nassar dapat tidak terdeteksi selama sekian lama dan merangkul setiap perubahan yang diperlukan dan sesuai.
mt: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may reveal how the proportion of abuse described so brazenly by Nassar's victims could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any changes that may be needed and appropriate.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: USA Gymnastics dan USOC mempunyai tujuan yang sama - mengupayakan agar olahraga senam dan lainnya dapat menjadi seaman mungkin bagi para atlet saat mereka mengejar impian mereka dalam lingkungan yang aman, positif, dan berdaya.
mt: USA Gymnastics and USOC have the same goal - ensuring that gymnastics and other sports can be as safe as possible for athletes as they pursue their dreams in a positive, empowering environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Sepanjang tahun 1960-an, Brzezinski bekerja untuk John F. Kennedy sebagai penasihatnya dan kemudian bekerja di pemerintahan Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his adviser and then worked in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Selama seleksi tahun 1976, ia menasihati Carter tentang kebijakan luar negeri, kemudian menjabat sebagai Penasihat Keamanan Nasional (NSA) dari tahun 1977 hingga tahun 1981, menggantikan Henry Kissinger.
mt: During Carter's 1976 presidential campaign, he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor from 1977 to 1981, replacing Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Sebagai NSA, ia mendampingi Carter dalam menangani persoalan diplomatik luar negeri, misalnya Perjanjian Camp David tahun 1978, normalisasi hubungan AS-China di akhir 1970-an, Revolusi Iran yang mengarah pada krisis tawanan Iran tahun 1979, dan invasi Soviet di Afghanistan tahun 1979.
mt: As NSA, he advised Carter on foreign policy matters, including the Camp David Accords of 1978, normalization of US-China relations in the late 1970s, the Iranian Revolution that led to the Iran hostage crisis of 1979, and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Film yang dibintangi Ryan Gosling dan Emma Stone ini memperoleh nominasi di semua kategori utama.
mt: 2016's La La Land, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling dan Stone masing-masing mendapatkan nominasi untuk Aktor dan Aktris terbaik.
mt: Gosling and Stone each received nominations for Best Actor and Actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Nominasi yang lain mencakup Gambar Terbaik, Sutradara Terbaik, Sinematografi Terbaik, Desain Kostum Terbaik, Penyuntingan Film Terbaik, Skor Orisinalitas, Desain Produksi Terbaik, Penyuntingan Suara Terbaik, Pemaduan Suara Terbaik, dan Skenario Asli Terbaik.
mt: Other nominations include Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Best Costume Design, Best Film Editing, Original Score, Best Production Design, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing, and Best Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Dua lagu dari film tersebut, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) dan City of Stars, menerima nominasi untuk lagu orisinal terbaik. Studio Lionsgate menerima 26 nominasi â€” paling banyak dibanding studio lainnya.
mt: Two songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Studio Lionsgate received 26 nominations â€” the most of any studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Di akhir hari Minggu, Presiden Amerika Serikat Donald Trump, dalam pernyataan yang dikirimkan lewat sekretariat juru bicara, mengumumkan bahwa tentara AS akan meninggalkan Suriah.
mt: On Sunday, President of the United States Donald Trump, in a statement sent through the White House press office, announced that US troops will leave Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Pengumuman itu dibuat setelah Trump melakukan percakapan telepon dengan Presiden Turki, Recep Tayyip ErdoÄŸan.
mt: The announcement came after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turki juga akan mengambil alih penjagaan prajurit ISIS yang tertangkap, yang menurut pernyatan tersebut, negara Eropa menolak untuk memulangkan mereka.
mt: Turkey will also take over the guarding of captured ISIS fighters, which according to the statement, European countries refuse to repatriate them.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Hal ini tidak hanya mengonfirmasi bahwa setidaknya beberapa dinosaurus berbulu, teori yang sudah menyebar luas, tetapi juga dapat memberikan detail yang biasanya tidak dapat diberikan oleh fosil, seperti warna dan susunan tiga dimensi.
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs were feathered, a theory that has been widespread, but also can provide details that are usually not provided by fossils, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Ilmuwan mengatakan bulu hewan ini berwarna cokelat seperti kastanye di bagian atas dengan bagian bawah berwarna pucat atau karotenoid.
mt: Scientists say the feathers are brown like chestnuts on top with a pale or carotenoid underside.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Penemuan ini juga memberikan wawasan tentang evolusi bulu pada burung.
mt: This discovery also provides insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Karena bulu dinosaurus tidak memiliki batang yang berkembang dengan baik, yang disebut rachis, tetapi memiliki ciri yang lain â€” duri dan barbule â€” peneliti berkesimpulan bahwa rachis mungkin merupakan perkembangan evolusi lebih akhir dibanding ciri-ciri lainnya.
mt: Because dinosaur feathers lacked a well-developed central shaft, called the rachis, but had other characteristics â€” quills and barbules â€” researchers concluded that the rachis may have been a later evolutionary development than the other features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Struktur bulu menunjukkan bahwa bulu tersebut tidak digunakan untuk terbang, melainkan untuk pengaturan suhu atau penampilan. Para peneliti berpendapat, meskipun ini adalah ekor anak dinosaurus, sampelnya menunjukkan bulu burung dewasa, bukan bulu anak ayam.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests that they were not used for flight, but for temperature regulation or display. The researchers speculate, although this is the tail of a baby dinosaur, the sample shows adult bird feathers, not baby chicken feathers.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Para peneliti berpendapat, meskipun ini adalah ekor anak dinosaurus, sampel memperlihatkan bulu burung dewasa, bukan bulu anak ayam.
mt: Researchers say, although this is a dinosaur's tail, the sample shows adult bird feathers, not baby chicken feathers.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Sebuah bom mobil yang meledak di markas polisi di Gaziantep, Turki kemarin pagi telah menewaskan dua petugas polisi, dan melukai lebih dari 20 orang lainnya.
mt: A car bomb that exploded at a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey this morning has killed two police officers, and injured more than 20 others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Kantor gubernur mengatakan sembilan belas orang yang terluka merupakan aparat kepolisian.
mt: 19 people injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Polisi mengatakan mereka mencurigai seorang yang diduga militan Daesh (ISIL) bertanggung jawab atas serangan tersebut.
mt: Police say they suspect a suspected Daesh (ISIL) militant is responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Mereka menemukan bahwa Matahari beroperasi dengan prinsip dasar yang sama seperti bintang lainnya: Diketahui bahwa aktivitas semua bintang dalam sistem didorong oleh terang cahayanya, perputarannya, hanya itu.
mt: They found that the Sun operates on the same basic principles as other stars: It is known that the activity of all stars in the system is driven by its brightness, its rotation, only that.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Luminositas dan rotasi digunakan secara bersamaan untuk menentukan bilangan Rossby dari sebuah bintang, yang berkaitan dengan aliran plasma.
mt: Luminosity and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Semakin kecil angka Rossby-nya, semakin kurang aktif bintang tersebut terkait pembalikan magnetik.
mt: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic reversals.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Selama perjalanannya, Iwasaki mengalami masalah dalam banyak kesempatan.
mt: During his journey, Iwasaki encountered problems in many occasions.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Ia dirampok oleh bajak laut, diserang di Tibet oleh seekor anjing gila, lolos dari pernikahan di Nepal, dan ditangkap di India.
mt: He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped from a wedding in Nepal, and arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Standar 802.11n beroperasi pada frekuensi 2,4 Ghz dan 5,0 Ghz.
mt: 802.11n operates on frequencies of 2.4 Ghz and 5.0 Ghz.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Ini akan memungkinkannya untuk kompatibel dengan 802.11a, 802.11b dan 802.11g, asalkan stasiun pangkalan memiliki radio ganda.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, as long as the base station has dual radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11n jauh lebih cepat daripada generasi sebelumnya dengan throughput teoretis maksimum 600Mbit/detik.
mt: 802.11n is much faster than previous generations with a theoretical maximum throughput of 600Mbit/sec.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall (yang menikah dengan dua anak-anak yang sudah dewasa) tidak meninggalkan kesan yang mendalam bagi Miller yang kisahnya terkait.
mt: Duvall (who is married with two adult children) did not leave a lasting impression on Miller, whose story is related.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: "Ketika dimintai komentar, Miller berkata, "Mike banyak berbicara selama sidang...Saya sedang bersiap-siap jadi saya tidak benar-benar mendengar apa yang ia katakan."
mt: "When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talked a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really listening to what he said."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Kami akan berusaha mengurangi emisi karbon dioksida per unit PDB dengan margin yang besar di tahun 2020 dari tingkat tahun 2005," kata Hu."
mt: "We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a large margin in 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Dia tidak menetapkan angka terkait pemotongan, dia mengatakan hal tersebut akan didasarkan pada hasil ekonomi China.
mt: He did not set a specific number for the cuts, saying it would be based on China's economic performance.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: "Hu mendorong negara berkembang "terlebih dahulu menghindari cara-cara lama, yaitu menimbulkan polusi kemudian membersihkannya."
mt: "Hu urged developing countries to "avoid old ways of polluting first, then cleaning up."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: "Ia menambahkan bahwa "mereka seharusnya tidak, tetapi dimintai untuk menjalankan kewajiban di luar tahapan perkembangan, tanggung jawab, dan kemampuannya." "
mt: "He added that "they should not, but were asked to perform their duties outside the stage of development, responsibility, and ability." "
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Kelompok Studi Irak mempresentasikan laporannya pada pukul 12.00 GMT hari ini.
mt: The Iraq Study Group will present its report at noon GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Ia memperingatkan bahwa tidak ada yang bisa menjamin bahwa tindakan apa pun di Irak saat ini mampu menghentikan perang antarkelompok, meningkatnya kekerasan, atau menghindari kekacauan.
mt: He warned that no action in Iraq at this time could guarantee that it would stop sectarian conflict, increase violence, or avoid chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Laporan tersebut dibuka dengan permohonan untuk debat terbuka dan pembentukan konsensus di Amerika Serikat tentang kebijakan terhadap Timur Tengah.
mt: The report opens with a call for an open debate and consensus in the United States on policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Laporan tersebut mengkritik tajam hampir setiap aspek kebijakan Eksekutif saat ini terhadap Irak dan mendesak perubahan arah kebijakan secepatnya.
mt: The report sharply criticizes almost every aspect of the Executive's current policy towards Iraq and urges a change of direction as soon as possible.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Yang pertama dari 78 rekomendasi adalah inisiatif diplomatik baru harus diadakan sebelum akhir tahun untuk mengamankan perbatasan Irak dari intervensi musuh dan menjalin ulang relasi diplomatik dengan tetangganya.
mt: 78 recommendations are the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first of the first
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Senator saat ini dan Ibu Negara Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner mengumumkan pencalonan dirinya sebagai presiden kemarin malam di La Plata, sebuah kota 50 kilometer (31 mil) dari Buenos Aires.
mt: Current senator and First Lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Ibu Kirchner mengumumkan tujuan dirinya untuk maju menjadi presiden di Teater Argentine, lokasi yang sama yang dia gunakan untuk memulai kampanyenya pada tahun 2005 untuk menjadi Senat sebagai anggota delegasi provinsi Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theater, the same location she used to start her campaign in 2005 to become a senator as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: "Perdebatan dipicu kontroversi terkait pengeluaran dana bantuan dan rekonstruksi pasca-Badai Katrina yang dilabeli oleh kelompok konservatif fiskal sebagai "Kesepakatan New Orleans Bush."
mt: "The debate was sparked by controversy over the funding of post-Katrina aid and reconstruction labeled by fiscal conservatives as the "New Orleans Bush Deal."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Kritik liberal terkait upaya rekonstruksi difokuskan pada pemberian kontrak rekonstruksi kepada orang dalam Washington.
mt: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to Washington insiders.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Lebih dari empat juta orang pergi ke Roma untuk menghadiri pemakaman.
mt: 4 million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Jumlah dari orang yang hadir sangatlah banyak sehingga tidak mungkin bagi semuanya untuk mendapatkan akses ke pemakaman di St. Peter's Square.
mt: The number of people attending was so great that it was impossible for everyone to gain access to the funeral at St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Beberapa layar televisi besar dipasang di berbagai tempat di Roma supaya orang-orang bisa menyaksikan upacara tersebut.
mt: Several large TV screens were set up in various places in Rome so that people could watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Di banyak kota-kota lain di Italia dan di belahan dunia lainnya, khususnya di Polandia, persiapan serupa dilakukan, yang disaksikan oleh banyak orang.
mt: In many other Italian cities and in other parts of the world, especially in Poland, similar preparations were made, which were witnessed by many people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Sejarawan pernah mengkritik kebijakan FBI di masa lalu, karena memfokuskan sumber daya pada kasus-kasus yang mudah diselesaikan khususnya kasus mobil curian, hanya untuk menaikkan tingkat keberhasilan agensi.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policies, for focusing resources on easy cases, especially car thefts, only to boost the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongres mulai mendanai Prakarsa Percabulan pada tahun fiskal 2005, dan menetapkan bahwa FBI harus membaktikan 10 agen untuk pornografi dewasa.
mt: Congress began funding the Child Pornography Prevention Act in fiscal year 2005, and mandated that the FBI devote 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa mencetak nilai tertinggi pada babak ini, 70 lari hanya dengan 41 bola dengan memukul 11 nilai empat dan 2 nilai enam.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest score in this innings, 70 runs with 41 balls with hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Batsmen tingkat menengah, Sachin Tendulkar dan Rahul Dravid, tampil dengan baik dan menjadi mitra seratus kali run.
mt: Middle-order batsmen Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid played well and became hundred-run partners.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Namun, setelah kehilangan gawang kapten, India hanya membuat 36 run, kebobolan 7 gawang saat mengakhiri inning tersebut.
mt: However, after losing the captain's wicket, India only made 36 runs, conceding 7 wickets when the innings ended.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Presiden AS George W. Bush tiba di Singapura pagi hari pada 16 November, memulai tur seminggu di Asia.
mt: 16 November, President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Dia disambut oleh Wakil Perdana Menteri Singapura Wong Kan Seng, dan membahas masalah perdagangan dan terorisme dengan Perdana Menteri Singapura Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng, and discussed trade and terrorism with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Setelah sepekan gagal pada pemilu pertengahan, Bush mengatakan kepada audiensnya tentang ekspansi dagang di Asia.
mt: After a week of failed mid-term elections, Bush told his audience about trade expansion in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Perdana Menteri Stephen Harper telah menyetujui untuk mengirim 'Clean Air Act' pemerintah kepada komite seluruh partai untuk ditinjau, sebelum pembacaan keduanya, pascapertemuan pada hari Selasa yang berlangsung selama 25 menit dengan pemimpin NDP Jack Layton, di PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to a full party committee for review, before its second reading, following a 25-minute meeting on Tuesday with NDP leader Jack Layton, at the PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: "Layton meminta untuk dilakukan perubahan pada RUU lingkungan konservatif selama pertemuan dengan PM, meminta "penulisan ulang yang menyeluruh dan lengkap" terhadap RUU lingkungan partai Konservatif."
mt: "Layton asked for a complete rewrite of the Conservative Party's environmental bill during a meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and comprehensive re-writing" of the Conservative Party's environmental bill."
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Bahkan sejak Pemerintah Federal turut andil dalam mengambil alih pendanaan RS Mersey di Devonport, Tasmania, pemerintah setempat dan sebagian anggota parlemen federal mengkritik tindakan ini sebagai persiapan menjelang pemilu yang akan berlangsung November.
mt: Even since the Federal Government took over funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, local government and some federal parliamentarians have criticised the move as electioneering ahead of the November poll.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Namun, Perdana Menteri John Howard mengatakan bahwa tindakan itu hanya untuk melindungi fasilitas rumah sakit dari penurunan peringkat oleh Pemerintah Tasmania, dengan memberikan tambahan 45 juta dolar Australia.
mt: However, Prime Minister John Howard said the move was only to protect the hospital's facilities from a downgrade by the Tasmanian government, with an additional $45 million Australian dollars.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Menurut buletin terbaru, pembacaan tinggi permukaan laut mengindikasikan bahwa tsunami telah muncul. Terdapat aktivitas tsunami signifikan yang terekam di dekat Pago Pago dan Niue.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicate a tsunami has occurred. Significant tsunami activity was recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Tidak ada laporan kerusakan atau cedera besar di Tonga, tetapi daya listrik untuk sementara terputus, yang dilaporkan membuat pihak otoritas Tongan tidak dapat menerima peringatan tsunami yang dikeluarkan oleh PTWC.
mt: There are no reports of damage or major injuries in Tonga, but power was cut for a time, which was reported to have prevented Tongan authorities from receiving a tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Empat belas sekolah di Hawaii yang terletak di atau dekat garis pantai ditutup sepanjang hari Rabu meskipun peringatannya dicabut.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii located on or near the shoreline were closed for the day Wednesday, despite the cancellation of the warning.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Presiden AS George W. Bush menerima pengumuman tersebut.
mt: President George W. Bush received the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: "Juru bicara Bush, Gordon Johndroe menyebut bahwa janji Korea Utara sebagai "sebuah langkah besar menuju tujuan pencapaian denuklirisasi yang dapat diverifikasi di Semenanjung Korea."
mt: "Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called the North Korean pledge "a big step toward verifiable denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Badai kesepuluh dari musim Badai Atlantik yang diberi nama Badai Subtropis Jerry terbentuk di Samudra Atlantik hari ini.
mt: 10th storm of the Atlantic hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Pusat Badai Nasional (NHC) menyatakan bahwa saat ini Badai Jerry tidak mengancam daratan.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) states that Hurricane Jerry is not currently threatening land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: U.S. Corps of Engineers memperkirakan bahwa curah hujan sebesar 6 inci ini mampu menerobos tanggul yang sudah rusak.
mt: 6 inches of rain is enough to breach the damaged levees, according to the U.S. Corps of Engineers.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Bangsal Kesembilan, yang terendam banjir setinggi 20 kaki saat Badai Katrina, saat ini terendam air setinggi pinggang karena tanggul di dekatnya roboh.
mt: 9th Street, which was flooded to a depth of 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is now flooded to a depth of waist-deep because a levee near it collapsed.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Air tumpah di atas tanggul di bagian selebar 100 kaki.
mt: 30 feet of the road was flooded.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Administrator Majelis Rendah, Adam Cuerden mengungkapkan kekesalannya atas penghapusan itu ketika ia berbicara kepada Wikinews bulan lalu.
mt: Administrator of the Low Board, Adam Cuerden, expressed his frustration with the deletion when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Pada dasarnya dia (Wales) telah berbohong kepada kami sejak awal. Pertama, dengan bertindak seolah-olah ini untuk alasan hukum. Kedua, dengan berpura-pura dia mendengarkan kami, hingga penghapusan karya seninya."
mt: "Essentially he (Wales) has been lying to us from the start. First, by acting as though this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending to listen to us, until the removal of his artwork."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Kekesalan komunitas berujung pada upaya yang ada saat ini untuk menyusun kebijakan mengenai konten seksual bagi situs yang menampung jutaan media berlisensi terbuka.
mt: Community outrage led to the current effort to draft policy on sexual content for sites hosting millions of licensed open media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Pekerjaan yang dilakukan sebagian besar bersifat teoretis, tetapi program ini ditulis untuk menyimulasikan pengamatan yang dilakukan terhadap galaksi Sagitarius.
mt: The work is mostly theoretical, but the program simulates observations of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Efek yang dicari oleh tim akan disebabkan oleh gaya pasang surut antara materi gelap galaksi dan materi gelap Bima Sakti.
mt: The effect sought by the team will be caused by the tidal forces between dark matter and the dark matter of the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Layaknya pasang surut yang terjadi akibat bulan menarik bumi, Bima Sakti memberi galaksi Sagitarius gaya.
mt: Like the tides caused by the moon pulling on the Earth, the Milky Way exerts a gravitational pull on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Para ilmuwan dapat menyimpulkan bahwa materi gelap mempengaruhi materi gelap lainnya dengan cara yang sama seperti materi biasa.
mt: Scientists can conclude that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as normal matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Teori ini mengatakan bahwa sebagian besar materi gelap di sekitar galaksi terletak di sekitar galaksi dalam bentuk lingkaran cahaya, dan terbuat dari banyak partikel kecil.
mt: This theory says that most of the dark matter around galaxies is located around galaxies in the form of a ring of light, and is made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Laporan televisi menunjukkan bahwa asap putih berasal dari pembangkit listrik tersebut.
mt: Television reports show white smoke coming from the power plant.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Otoritas lokal memperingatkan warga sekitar akan tanaman-tanaman yang harus tetap berada di luar ruangan, mematikan pendingin ruangan, dan tidak meminum air keran.
mt: Local authorities warn residents to keep plants outside, turn off air conditioning, and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Menurut lembaga nuklir Jepang, yodin dan sesium radioaktif telah diidentifikasi pada pembangkit listrik tersebut.
mt: According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive iodine and cesium have been identified at the power plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Pihak berwajib berspekulasi bahwa ini adalah indikasi bahwa penampung berisi bahan bakar uranium di situs telah robek dan bocor.
mt: Officials speculate that this is an indication that the fuel storage containers at the site have ruptured and leaked.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll menemukan TBC yang Sangat Tahan terhadap Obat (XDR-TB) di wilayah KwaZulu-Natal, Afrika Selatan.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll found Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region, South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: "Dalam sebuah wawancara, dia mengatakan varian baru itu "sangat mengganggu dan mengkhawatirkan karena tingkat kematiannya yang sangat tinggi."
mt: "In an interview, he said the new variant was "very disturbing and worrying because of its very high mortality rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Sebagian pasien kemungkinan ketularan penyakit itu di rumah sakit, menurut perkiraan Dr. Moll, dan paling sedikit dua orang adalah petugas kesehatan di rumah sakit.
mt: Some patients may have contracted the disease at the hospital, according to Dr. Moll's estimate, and at least two are hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
